title: Fall 2021
description: In our Fall 2021 Town Hall, we continued the conversation on critical issues such as inclusion and curriculum reform with the CS department while empowering students to share their concerns with professors and the department's leadership.
alt_text: A group photograph from the Fall 2021 Computer Science Town Hall.

title: Spring 2022
description: In our Spring 2022 Town Hall, we focused on identifying effective teaching practices and dicussed the curriculum reform with the CS department while enabling more students to directly address their concerns with professors and the department's leadership.
alt_text: A photograph from the Spring 2022 Computer Science Town Hall. Professor Eggert is introducing himself and other professors are sitting beside him.

title: Fall 2022
description: In our Fall 2022 Town Hall, we centered our attention on several important topics, including proposed reforms to the Computer Science curriculum, exploring research opportunities for undergraduates, and ongoing discussions around enabling students to provide anonymous feedback to faculty members.
alt_text: Fall 2022 Computer Science Town Hall Banner.

title: Spring 2023
description: In our Spring 2023 Town Hall, we focused on topics such as the faculty's responsiveness to feedback, the introduction of autograders, the relevance of Physics as a degree requirement, and issues surrounding academic dishonesty, including the impact of tools like GPT.
alt_text: Spring 2023 Computer Science Town Hall Banner.

title: Fall 2023
description: In our Spring 2023 Town Hall, we focused on topics such as the faculty's responsiveness to feedback, the introduction of autograders, the relevance of Physics as a degree requirement, and issues surrounding academic dishonesty, including the impact of tools like GPT.
alt_text: Fall 2023 Computer Science Town Hall Banner.

title: Spring 2024
description: Though our Spring Town Hall was unfortunately cancelled due to the uncertain situation on the UCLA campus, Professor Reinman made a video addressing some of the key concerns brought up by students in the survey, including CS Ethics and enrollment challenges.
alt_text: Spring 2024 Computer Science Town Hall Banner.

title: Fall 2024
description: In our Fall 2024 Town Hall, we discussed issues such as the reworking of degree requirements, LA pay, current elective offerings, course scheduling, and more.
alt_text: Fall 2024 Computer Science Town Hall Banner.
